item.description:
I'm writing to call your attention to a terrific all-day lecture by Pulitzer Prize-winning photojournalist Vincent Loforet that is part of CIPNE 46th Annual conference on Saturday, April 28, 2007. The lecture is sponsored by Canon Explorers of Light, so admission is only five dollars.
Holiday Inn, 1200 Beacon Street, Brookline, MA

Pre-registration is required.
The subject of his presentation is the creative process (Stop. Think. Act.),

http://... www.cipne.org - to register
http://www.vincentlaf...

One of the most exciting things about Vincent is that, in addition to being an acclaimed photojournalist, he's also a fine art and commercial photographer.

Recognized as one of the "30 photographers to watch under 30" by PDN in 2002 and was named one of the
"100 Most Influential People in Photography" by American Photo Magazine in 2005.

I hope you will share this information with students, colleagues, and others who might be interested in a uniquely informative and inspirational lecture with a true master of contemporary photography.

Saturday, April 29

8:00 - 8:30 AM Registration
8:15 - 9:00 Image Competition Critique
9:00 AM - 12:00 PM Vincent Laforet: Stop, Think, Act! [About Vincent]
A behind the scenes view of the creative process behind many of Vincent's more successful images. You will see the initial photographs that did not initially work & how they progressed into their final form.
Sponsored by Canon USA, Explorers of Light program.
12:00 - 12:45 Annual Business Meeting Election of Officers
12:45 - 2:00 PM Lunch on your own
2:00 - 4:00 PM Vincent Laforet (cont.)
4:15 - 4:45 PM Awards Presentation
5:00 PM Conference ends

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: A terrific all-day lecture by Pulitzer Prize-winning photojournalist Vincent Lof
